org.sakaiproject.api.app.podcasts

Interface PodcastService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PodcastServiceImpl

    public interface PodcastService

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COLLECTION_PODCASTS
      This string can be used to find the service in the service manager.
      static String COLLECTION_PODCASTS_ALT
      This string can be used as an alternate method to finding the podcasts folder
      static String COLLECTION_PODCASTS_DESCRIPTION
      This string gives description for podcasts folder
      static String COLLECTION_PODCASTS_FEED
      This string used as part of URL for podcast feed
      static String COLLECTION_PODCASTS_TITLE
      This string used for Title of the podcast collection
      static String DISPLAY_DATE
      This string is the name of the property used when displaying and sorting the podcasts
      static String DISPLAY_TITLE
      This string is the name of the property for the title of a podcast in the feed
      static String PODCASTS_SERVICE_NAME
      This string gives the Service name (class w/ package prefix) for podcast service

    • Method Detail

      • checkPodcastFolder

        boolean checkPodcastFolder()
                           throws InUseException,
                                  PermissionException
        Determines if podcast folder is part of Resources of site. If not, creates it.
        Returns:
        true if folder exists/created, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InUseException
        PermissionException

      • checkDISPLAY_DATE

        List checkDISPLAY_DATE(List resourcesList)
        Will check if any podcasts were added in Resources and do not have their DISPLAY_DATE property set.
        Parameters:
        resourcesList - The List of podcasts to check
        Returns:
        List of updated podcasts

      • checkForActualPodcasts

        boolean checkForActualPodcasts()
                               throws PermissionException
        Determines if there are actual podcasts in the folder
        Returns:
        true if there are actual podcasts, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • setContentHostingService

        void setContentHostingService(ContentHostingService chs)
        Used to inject the ContentHostingService
        Parameters:
        chs - The application's ContentHostingService

      • setToolManager

        void setToolManager(ToolManager tm)
        Used to inject the ToolManager
        Parameters:
        tm - The application's ToolManager

      • getPodcasts

        List getPodcasts()
                 throws PermissionException,
                        InUseException,
                        IdInvalidException,
                        InconsistentException,
                        IdUsedException
        Returns a list of the podcasts stored in site/podcasts folder
        Returns:
        List of podcasts
        Throws:
        PermissionException
        InUseException
        IdInvalidException
        InconsistentException
        IdUsedException

      • getPodcasts

        List getPodcasts(String siteID)
                 throws PermissionException,
                        InUseException,
                        IdInvalidException,
                        InconsistentException,
                        IdUsedException
        Returns a list of the podcasts stored in site/podcasts folder
        Parameters:
        siteID - Passed in by the podfeed server
        Returns:
        List of podcasts
        Throws:
        PermissionException
        InUseException
        IdInvalidException
        InconsistentException
        IdUsedException

        Returns SiteId for the site this tool is a part of

        String of the site id

        Returns:
        String of the user ID

        String getUserName()
        Returns user display name for current user
        Returns:
        String of the user display name

      • getPodcastFileURL

        String getPodcastFileURL(String resourceId)
                         throws PermissionException,
                                IdUnusedException
        Returns the full URL of the file from ContentHostingService
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The ID for the file whose URL is wanted
        Returns:
        String The full URL for the file
        Throws:
        PermissionException
        IdUnusedException

      • getPodcastsFolderRef

        String getPodcastsFolderRef()
        Returns a reference to the Podcasts folder in Resources. Used to display permissions page.

      • addPodcast

        void addPodcast(String title,
              Date displayDate,
              String description,
              byte[] body,
              String filename,
              String contentType)
                throws OverQuotaException,
                       ServerOverloadException,
                       InconsistentException,
                       IdInvalidException,
                       IdLengthException,
                       PermissionException,
                       IdUniquenessException
        Does the actual adding of podcast to Resources
        Parameters:
        title - User specified title for the podcast
        displayDate - Date when podcast will be available for viewing
        description - User specified description for the podcast
        body - The actual contents of the podcast
        filename - The filename of the podcast being saved
        Throws:
        OverQuotaException
        ServerOverloadException
        InconsistentException
        IdInvalidException
        IdLengthException
        PermissionException
        IdUniquenessException

      • removePodcast

        void removePodcast(String resourceId)
                   throws IdUnusedException,
                          InUseException,
                          TypeException,
                          PermissionException
        Removes a podcast from site/podcasts folder
        Parameters:
        resourceId - resourceId of the podcast to be deleted
        Throws:
        IdUnusedException
        InUseException
        TypeException
        PermissionException

        ContentCollection getContentCollection(String siteId)
                                       throws IdUnusedException,
                                              PermissionException
        Returns the ContentCollection that contains the podcasts.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id to pull the correct collection

        ContentCollection

                                                   throws IdUnusedException,

      • reviseOptions

        void reviseOptions(boolean option)
        Changes whether the podcast folder is public/private
        Parameters:
        option - int that sets the public/private option

      • filterPodcasts

        List filterPodcasts(List resourcesList)
        Only add podcast resources whose DISPLAY_DATE is today or earlier 2 parameter for filtering podcasts for feed. First method is when activated from within Podcasts tool, second when coming from servlet so need to pass in site id wanted.
        Parameters:
        resourcesList - List of podcasts
        Returns:
        List of podcasts whose DISPLAY_DATE is today or before

      • filterPodcasts

        List filterPodcasts(List resourcesList,
                  String siteId)

      • getOptions

        int getOptions()
        Gets whether the podcast folder is Publicly viewable or not.
        Returns:
        int 0 = Public 1 = Site

      • commitContentCollection

        void commitContentCollection(ContentCollectionEdit contentCollectionEdit)
        Commit the changes made to the ContentCollection.
        Parameters:
        contentCollectionEdit - The ContentCollection object that needs to be commited.

      • cancelContentCollection

        void cancelContentCollection(ContentCollectionEdit cce)
        Cancels attempt at changing this collection (releases the lock)
        Parameters:
        cce - The ContentCollectionEdit that is not to be changed

      • retrievePodcastFolderId

        String retrievePodcastFolderId(String siteId)
                               throws PermissionException
        Returns podcast folder id using either 'podcasts' or 'Podcasts'. If it does not exist in either form, will create it.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site to search
        Returns:
        String containing the complete id for the podcast folder
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • isPublic

        boolean isPublic(String siteId)
        Returns whether site is Public (true) or Site (false)
        Parameters:
        siteId -
        Returns:

      • getGMTdate

        Date getGMTdate(long date)
        Takes the date String passed in and converts it to a Date object using GMT time
        Parameters:
        date - A long value representing the date to be converted`
        Returns:
        Date object created

      • allowAccess

        boolean allowAccess(String id)
        Determines if authenticated user has 'read' access to podcast collection folder
        Parameters:
        id - The id for the podcast collection folder
        Returns:
        TRUE - has read access, FALSE - does not

      • isPodcastFolderHidden

        boolean isPodcastFolderHidden(String siteId)
                              throws IdUnusedException,
                                     PermissionException
        Returns TRUE if Podcasts folder has been set to HIDDEN.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id to check
        Throws:
        IdUnusedException
        PermissionException
